channel.title: How to get An Npc to fast a certain direction
channel.description:
Ok so i have this in my Autospawn.cfg
//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption
and i know that
RangeX1-RangeY1
is the most North-east X+Y co-ordinates and
RangeX2-RangeY2
is the most South-West X+Y co-ordinates. But how would i get an npc to face West using these? Can anybody help me These are the Npc's i want to face west
spawn = 494 3187 3436 0 0 0 0 0 1 Banker spawn = 494 3187 3438 0 0 0 0 0 1 Banker spawn = 494 3187 3440 0 0 0 0 0 1 Banker spawn = 494 3187 3442 0 0 0 0 0 1 Banker spawn = 494 3187 3444 0 0 0 0 0 1 Banker spawn = 494 3187 3446 0 0 0 0 0 1 Banker
Can Somebody Please Help
